data.message:
Hello
I have problem with my second account (Profi Sound Nagłośnienie Zakopane), you blocked it, because that account represents my company. This is not compatible with Facebook policy. You want to see my identyfication document, but I want to delete this account. this is not possible, because i can't log in on this account. Can you help me?

replies.message: Hi, Jakub. You can close or recover an old account. Learn more here: https://www.facebook.com/help/231208473756221. -Rhea
